item.title: [SCRUM-58] 4.2. Verify pager navigation between months
pre-conditions: 2. Chrome browser is installed on desktop;
steps: 1. Login with a valid email and password;
expected results: 1. Main page is loaded. Reports button is visible.
2. Reports page is loaded. Expenses and income are visible;
3. Current month and year are visible. Forward and backward arrows are visible;
4. Arrow is deactivated. Information on the page is the same. There is no changes.
5. Current month and current year are displayed. Current month's information is displayed;
6. December 2023 is displayed. Information about December 2023 are displayed.
